title: Eat the rich
creator_credit: Ironfist Pictures, Tim Van Rellim and Peter Richardson
brief_description: From the makers of the “Comic strip” and the “Young Ones”, this black and often tasteless comedy is certain to startle. Alex, a black waiter at a celebrated restaurant for the rich called “Bastards”, is sacked. Determined to wreak revenge, he organises a people’s take over and captures the restaurant. Renaming it “Eat the Rich”, Alex and his friends serve up their own special brand of millionaires mince. Not for the faint-hearted and with a heavy metal soundtrack by Motorhead.
